formatted_address: 1 Pasir Ris Close, #01-330, 1 Pasir Ris Cl, #01-331 &, Singapore 519599
name: Three Little Coconut by Mr. Coconut @ Downtown East

reviews.text:
The best desserts with different flavours which are unique
Friendly staff
Very patience n perfect in dressing the
dessert
Always love this place

The coconut snowy ice quality was good! But we both felt that something about the paste & toppings to ice ratio was off -- we finished the sides and still had quite a lot of ice left... suggestion to have a bit more paste/toppings, with slightly less shaved ice

The coconut dessert is truly delightful, with its rich flavor and creamy texture. It strikes the perfect balance between sweetness and freshness, making each bite a pleasure. The presentation is also lovely, adding to the overall experience. A delicious treat thatâ€™s sure to please any coconut loverâ€”highly recommended!

Flavour is amazing, I ordered the Coconut-flavoured snowy Ice for 04.10 SGD with the use of Grab App (Original price is 08.10 SGD).
The shaved coconut just melts in your mouth. It feels like eating snow!

Love the comfortable decor, clean tables and chairs. Trays were also not sticky although this was a Chinese, croffles and snow ice desserts place. There was no additional GST or service charge for dine-ins. Wide variety of desserts and probably the best mango pomelo sago I've ever had! Dessert was a perfect level of sweetness ðŸ¤¤ Definitely will be back!
